continueLogin.title: Sign In
continueLogin.message: Check and approve on your existing Criptext device to continue

deviceNotApproved.title: Sign In Rejected
deviceNotApproved.message: Your request to access this account was rejected by a verified device.

warning.text: Multiple rejections could lead your device to be blacklisted from Criptext.

usePassword.title: Warning
usePassword.message: If you sign in using your password your mailbox history from other devices won't be available on this device. Would you like to continue?

forgotPasswordMessage.title: Reset Password
forgotPasswordMessage.prefix: A reset link was sent to
forgotPasswordMessage.suffix: The link will be valid for 30 minutes

notSetError.title: No Recovery Email
notSetError.message: Password recovery is impossible as no recovery email was set on your account. For further assistance contact us:

fallbackError.title: Reset Password
fallbackError.message: Failed to send the Reset password link. Try again

checkbox.prefix: I have read and agree with the

confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.title: Well, that's odd...
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.message: Something has happened that is delaying this process.
confirmWaitingApprovalLogin.detail: Do you want to continue waiting?
